trans-unit.source: The SearchResult class encapsulates a node in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy that is returned during a search through <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe SearchResult incapsula un nodo nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory che viene restituito durante una ricerca tramite <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Instances of the SearchResult class are very similar to instances of <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class.
trans-unit.target: Le istanze della classe SearchResult sono molto simili alle istanze della <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The crucial difference is that the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> class retrieves its information from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy each time a new object is accessed, whereas the data for SearchResult is already available in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>, where it gets returned from a query that is performed with the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> class.
trans-unit.target: La differenza fondamentale è che la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>classe recupera le informazioni dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory ogni volta che un nuovo oggetto si accede, mentre i dati per SearchResult sono già disponibili <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection>in cui vengono restituiti da una query che viene eseguita con la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>classe.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry>

trans-unit.source: Only those properties that are specified through the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection in your query will be available from SearchResult.
trans-unit.target: Solo le proprietà che vengono specificate tramite il <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>insieme nella query saranno disponibili dalla SearchResult.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> that corresponds to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"></xref> from the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Recupera il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> </xref> che corrisponde alla <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult"> </xref> dalla gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use GetDirectoryEntry when you want to look at the live entry instead of the entry that was returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, or when you want to invoke a method on the object that was returned.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare GetDirectoryEntry quando si vuole cercare la voce attiva anziché la voce restituita tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>, o quando si desidera richiamare un metodo per l'oggetto restituito.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Calling GetDirectoryEntry on each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult> returned through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> can be slow.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare GetDirectoryEntry in ogni <xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>restituiti tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>può essere lento.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult>

trans-unit.source: The Path property uniquely identifies this entry in the Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Path identifica in modo univoco questa voce nella gerarchia di servizi di dominio Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The entry can always be retrieved using this path.
trans-unit.target: La voce può sempre essere recuperata utilizzando questo percorso.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of properties for this object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"> </xref> raccolta di proprietà per questo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This collection only contains properties that were explicitly requested through <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta contiene solo le proprietà che sono stati richiesti in modo esplicito tramite <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PropertiesToLoad%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"></xref> of properties set on this object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ResultPropertyCollection"> </xref> di proprietà impostate per questo oggetto.
